availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Margarite Hudson Burrus in Mercer County on January 13, 1846. Farmer in Mercer County in 1850 and in 1860. Father of John Burrus, Sarah Burrus, Lucy B. Burrus, Mary Burrus, and Nancy Burrus.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 291A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, p. 99.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 7, p. 14.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, County Marriages, Film #000191859, p. 54.
